tasks.title: Set up OpenClaw Multi-Agent System
tasks.description: Build the complete multi-agent system with Virtual Assistant and Dev teams, including Docker infrastructure, shared state, and heartbeat coordination.

tasks.title: Document agent system architecture
tasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation explaining the multi-agent system architecture, how agents communicate, and how to use it.

tasks.title: Create example project in Docker
tasks.description: Set up a sample application using Node.js in Docker to demonstrate the development workflow.

tasks.title: Fix web access for agents
tasks.description: Install web fetching tools (lynx, curl, web-fetch.sh) to enable agents to access hyperlinks and resources shared by human.

tasks.title: Set up betting prediction market MVP infrastructure
tasks.description: Create Docker environment for betting bot with Jupyter, PostgreSQL, and Kalshi API integration based on MVP analysis.
